JGAL

Class GAL_Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_Configuration

  • public class GAL_Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_Configuration contains all the configuration data needed for running a GA and the methods that requiere of the configuration to work.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GAL_ChromosomeConfig chromosomeConfig
      The configuration for the chromosomes that will be used by this GA.
      protected GAL_TerminationCondition condition
      The termination condition that will be used by this GA.
      protected GAL_FitnessFunction fitnessFunction
      The fitness function that will be used by this GA.
      protected GAL_Initializer initializer
      The initializer that will be useb by this GA
      protected GAL_GeneticOperator[] operators
      The genetic operators that will be used by this GA.
      protected GAL_NaturalSelector selector
      The natural selector that will be useb by this GA

    • Method Detail

      • verifyTerminationCondition

        public boolean verifyTerminationCondition(GAL_Population[] window)
        Verifies if the termination condition is archieved.
        Parameters:
        window - The window of GAL_Population used to verify the termination condition.
        Returns:
        true if the termination condition is archieved, false otherwise.

      • computeAllFitness

        public void computeAllFitness(GAL_Population population)
        Computes the fitness for an entire population.
        Parameters:
        population - The population that will get its fitness calculated.

      • createNewPopulation

        public GAL_Population createNewPopulation(int size)
                                   throws NotValidChromosomeException,
                                          NotValidPopulationException
        Creates a new population under the configuration given by chromosomeConfig.
        Parameters:
        size - The number of chromosomes that will get the population.
        Returns:
        The new GAL_Population.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the configuration has an empty gene configuration.
        NotValidPopulationException - If the size is less than 1.

      • createNewPopulation

        public GAL_Population createNewPopulation(GAL_Chromosome[] chromosomes)
                                   throws NotValidChromosomeException,
                                          NotValidPopulationException
        Creates a new population under the configuration given by chromosomeConfig and an array of chromosomes.
        Parameters:
        chromosomes - The chromosomes that will be used for the new population.
        Returns:
        The new GAL_Population.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the array of chromosomes does not match with the configuration.
        NotValidPopulationException - If the length of the array of chromosomes is less than 1.

      • selectNewPopulation

        public GAL_Population selectNewPopulation(GAL_Population origin)
                                   throws NotValidOperationException
        Select a new population generated with the natural selector.
        Parameters:
        origin - The population thats going to be used for the selection.
        Returns:
        A new population created from the origin population.
        Throws:
        NotValidOperationException - If an operation can't be done with the given parameters.

      • operatePopulation

        public GAL_Population operatePopulation(GAL_Population origin)
                                 throws NotValidOperationException
        Applies all the genetic operators in the order they are in the operators array.
        Parameters:
        origin - The GAL_Population thats going to be modified by all operators.
        Returns:
        A new GAL_Population wich has been modified by all the genetic operators.
        Throws:
        NotValidOperationException - If an operation can't be done with the given parameters.

      • operatePopulation

        public GAL_Population operatePopulation(GAL_Population origin,
                               int pos)
                                 throws NotValidOperationException
        Applies the genetic operator in the position given by the int parameter.
        Parameters:
        origin - The GAL_Population thats going to be modified by the operator.
        pos - The position of the genetic operator.
        Returns:
        A new GAL_Population wich has been modified by the genetic operator.
        Throws:
        NotValidOperationException

      • changeProbTo

        public double changeProbTo(int pos,
                  double prob)
        Changes the probability of the genetic operator at the position indicated by the first parameter.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the genetic operator.
        prob - The new probability for the genetic operator.
        Returns:
        The old probability for the genetic operator.

      • operatorsArraySize

        public int operatorsArraySize()
        Returns the size of the genetic operators array.
        Returns:
        The size of the genetic operators array.
